abstractContent.text: There have been various attempts at using the sublanguage notion for disambi-guation and the selection of target language equivalents in machine translation.
In this paper a theoretical concept and its implementation in areal MT application are presented.
Above this, means of linguistic engineering like weighting mechanisms are proposed.

introductionContent.text: It has been proposed by a number of authors (cf. to use the sublanguage notion for solving some of the notorious problems in machine translation (MT) such as disambiguation and selection of target language equivalents.
In the following, I shall give a rough summary of what sublanguages can contribute to the solution of concrete MT problems.
